chapter.text: Alif-Lam-Mim
Ghulibati Ar-Rumu
Fi 'Adna Al-'Arđi Wa Hum Min Ba`di Ghalabihim Sayaghlibuna
Fi Biđ`i Sinina Lillahi Al-'Amru Min Qablu Wa Min Ba`du Wa Yawma'idhin Yafrahu Al-Mu'uminuna
Binasri Allahi Yansuru Man Yasha'u Wa Huwa Al-`Azizu Ar-Rahimu
Wa`da Allahi La Yukhlifu Allahu Wa`dahu Wa Lakinna 'Akthara An-Nasi La Ya`lamuna
Ya`lamuna Zahiraan Mina Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Wa Hum `Ani Al-'Akhirati Hum Ghafiluna
Awalam Yatafakkaru Fi 'Anfusihim Ma Khalaqa Allahu As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđa Wa Ma Baynahuma 'Illa Bil-Haqqi Wa 'Ajalin Musammaan Wa 'Inna Kathiraan Mina An-Nasi Biliqa'i Rabbihim Lakafiruna

Awalam Yasiru Fi Al-'Arđi Fayanzuru Kayfa Kana `Aqibatu Al-Ladhina Min Qablihim Kanu 'Ashadda Minhum Quwatan Wa 'Atharu Al-'Arđa Wa `Amaruha 'Akthara Mimma `Amaruha Wa Ja'at/hum Rusuluhum Bil-Bayyinati Fama Kana Allahu Liyazlimahum Wa Lakin Kanu 'Anfusahum Yazlimuna
Thumma Kana `Aqibata Al-Ladhina 'Asa'u As-Su'a 'An Kadhabu Bi'ayati Allahi Wa Kanu Biha Yastahzi'un
Allahu Yabda'u Al-Khalqa Thumma Yu`iduhu Thumma 'Ilayhi Turja`una
Wa Yawma Taqumu As-Sa`atu Yublisu Al-Mujrimuna
Wa Lam Yakun Lahum Min Shuraka'ihim Shufa`a'u Wa Kanu Bishuraka'ihim Kafirina
Wa Yawma Taqumu As-Sa`atu Yawma'idhin Yatafarraquna
Fa'amma Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Fahum Fi Rawđatin Yuhbaruna
Wa 'Amma Al-Ladhina Kafaru Wa Kadhabu Bi'ayatina Wa Liqa'i Al-'Akhirati Fa'ula'ika Fi Al-`Adhabi Muhđaruna
Fasubhana Allahi Hina Tumsuna Wa Hina Tusbihuna
Wa Lahu Al-Hamdu Fi As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Wa `Ashiyaan Wa Hina Tuzhiruna
Yukhriju Al-Hayya Mina Al-Mayyiti Wa Yukhriju Al-Mayyita Mina Al-Hayyi Wa Yuhyi Al-'Arđa Ba`da Mawtiha Wa Kadhalika Tukhrajuna
Wa Min 'Ayatihi 'An Khalaqakum Min Turabin Thumma 'Idha 'Antum Basharun Tantashiruna
Wa Min 'Ayatihi 'An Khalaqa Lakum Min 'Anfusikum 'Azwajaan Litaskunu 'Ilayha Wa Ja`ala Baynakum Mawaddatan Wa Rahmatan 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Liqawmin Yatafakkaruna
Wa Min 'Ayatihi Khalqu As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Wa Akhtilafu 'Alsinatikum Wa 'Alwanikum 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Lil`alimina
Wa Min 'Ayatihi Manamukum Bil-Layli Wa An-Nahari Wa Abtigha'uukum Min Fađlihi 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Liqawmin Yasma`una
Wa Min 'Ayatihi Yurikumu Al-Barqa Khawfaan Wa Tama`aan Wa Yunazzilu Mina As-Sama'i Ma'an Fayuhyi Bihi Al-'Arđa Ba`da Mawtiha 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Liqawmin Ya`qiluna
Wa Min 'Ayatihi 'An Taquma As-Sama'u Wa Al-'Arđu Bi'amrihi Thumma 'Idha Da`akum Da`watan Mina Al-'Arđi 'Idha 'Antum Takhrujuna
Wa Lahu Man Fi As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Kullun Lahu Qanituna
Wa Huwa Al-Ladhi Yabda'u Al-Khalqa Thumma Yu`iduhu Wa Huwa 'Ahwanu `Alayhi Wa Lahu Al-Mathalu Al-'A`la Fi As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Wa Huwa Al-`Azizu Al-Hakimu

Đaraba Lakum Mathalaan Min 'Anfusikum Hal Lakum Min Ma Malakat 'Aymanukum Min Shuraka'a Fi Ma Razaqnakum Fa'antum Fihi Sawa'un Takhafunahum Kakhifatikum 'Anfusakum Kadhalika Nufassilu Al-'Ayati Liqawmin Ya`qiluna
Bal Attaba`a Al-Ladhina Zalamu 'Ahwa'ahum Bighayri `Ilmin Faman Yahdi Man 'Ađalla Allahu Wa Ma Lahum Min Nasirina
Fa'aqim Wajhaka Lilddini Hanifaan Fitrata Allahi Allati Fatara An-Nasa `Alayha La Tabdila Likhalqi Allahi Dhalika Ad-Dinu Al-Qayyimu Wa Lakinna 'Akthara An-Nasi La Ya`lamuna
Munibina 'Ilayhi Wa Attaquhu Wa 'Aqimu As-Salaata Wa La Takunu Mina Al-Mushrikina
Mina Al-Ladhina Farraqu Dinahum Wa Kanu Shiya`aan Kullu Hizbin Bima Ladayhim Farihuna
Wa 'Idha Massa An-Nasa Đurrun Da`aw Rabbahum Munibina 'Ilayhi Thumma 'Idha 'Adhaqahum Minhu Rahmatan 'Idha Fariqun Minhum Birabbihim Yushrikuna
Liyakfuru Bima 'Ataynahum Fatamatta`u Fasawfa Ta`lamuna
Am 'Anzalna `Alayhim Sultanaan Fahuwa Yatakallamu Bima Kanu Bihi Yushrikuna
Wa 'Idha 'Adhaqna An-Nasa Rahmatan Farihu Biha Wa 'In Tusibhum Sayyi'atun Bima Qaddamat 'Aydihim 'Idha Hum Yaqnatuna
Awalam Yaraw 'Anna Allaha Yabsutu Ar-Rizqa Liman Yasha'u Wa Yaqdiru 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Liqawmin Yu'uminuna
Fa'ati Dha Al-Qurba Haqqahu Wa Al-Miskina Wa Abna As-Sabili Dhalika Khayrun Lilladhina Yuriduna Wajha Allahi Wa 'Ula'ika Humu Al-Muflihuna
Wa Ma 'Ataytum Min Ribaan Liyarbuwa Fi 'Amwali An-Nasi Fala Yarbu `Inda Allahi Wa Ma 'Ataytum Min Zakaatin Turiduna Wajha Allahi Fa'ula'ika Humu Al-Muđ`ifuna
Allahu Al-Ladhi Khalaqakum Thumma Razaqakum Thumma Yumitukum Thumma Yuhyikum Hal Min Shuraka'ikum Man Yaf`alu Min Dhalikum Min Shay'in Subhanahu Wa Ta`ala `Amma Yushrikuna
Zahara Al-Fasadu Fi Al-Barri Wa Al-Bahri Bima Kasabat 'Aydi An-Nasi Liyudhiqahum Ba`đa Al-Ladhi `Amilu La`allahum Yarji`una
Qul Siru Fi Al-'Arđi Fanzuru Kayfa Kana `Aqibatu Al-Ladhina Min Qablu Kana 'Aktharuhum Mushrikina
Fa'aqim Wajhaka Lilddini Al-Qayyimi Min Qabli 'An Ya'tiya Yawmun La Maradda Lahu Mina Allahi Yawma'idhin Yassadda`una
Man Kafara Fa`alayhi Kufruhu Wa Man `Amila Salihaan Fali'anfusihim Yamhaduna
Liyajziya Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Min Fađlihi 'Innahu La Yuhibbu Al-Kafirina
Wa Min 'Ayatihi 'An Yursila Ar-Riyaha Mubashiratin Wa Liyudhiqakum Min Rahmatihi Wa Litajriya Al-Fulku Bi'amrihi Wa Litabtaghu Min Fađlihi Wa La`allakum Tashkuruna
Wa Laqad 'Arsalna Min Qablika Rusulaan 'Ila Qawmihim Faja'uhum Bil-Bayyinati Fantaqamna Mina Al-Ladhina 'Ajramu Wa Kana Haqqaan `Alayna Nasru Al-Mu'uminina

Allahu Al-Ladhi Yursilu Ar-Riyaha Fatuthiru Sahabaan Fayabsutuhu Fi As-Sama'i Kayfa Yasha'u Wa Yaj`aluhu Kisafaan Fatara Al-Wadqa Yakhruju Min Khilalihi Fa'idha 'Asaba Bihi Man Yasha'u Min `Ibadihi 'Idha Hum Yastabshiruna
Wa 'In Kanu Min Qabli 'An Yunazzala `Alayhim Min Qablihi Lamublisina
Fanzur 'Ila 'Athari Rahmati Allahi Kayfa Yuhyi Al-'Arđa Ba`da Mawtiha 'Inna Dhalika Lamuhyi Al-Mawta Wa Huwa `Ala Kulli Shay'in Qadirun
Wa La'in 'Arsalna Rihaan Fara'awhu Musfarraan Lazallu Min Ba`dihi Yakfuruna
Fa'innaka La Tusmi`u Al-Mawta Wa La Tusmi`u As-Summa Ad-Du`a'a 'Idha Wa Llaw Mudbirina
Wa Ma 'Anta Bihadi Al-`Umyi `An Đalalatihim 'In Tusmi`u 'Illa Man Yu'uminu Bi'ayatina Fahum Muslimun
Allahu Al-Ladhi Khalaqakum Min Đa`fin Thumma Ja`ala Min Ba`di Đa`fin Quwatan Thumma Ja`ala Min Ba`di Quwatin Đa`faan Wa Shaybatan Yakhluqu Ma Yasha'u Wa Huwa Al-`Alimu Al-Qadiru
Wa Yawma Taqumu As-Sa`atu Yuqsimu Al-Mujrimuna Ma Labithu Ghayra Sa`atin Kadhalika Kanu Yu'ufakuna
Wa Qala Al-Ladhina 'Utu Al-`Ilma Wa Al-'Imana Laqad Labithtum Fi Kitabi Allahi 'Ila Yawmi Al-Ba`thi Fahadha Yawmu Al-Ba`thi Wa Lakinnakum Kuntum La Ta`lamuna
Fayawma'idhin La Yanfa`u Al-Ladhina Zalamu Ma`dhiratuhum Wa La Hum Yusta`tabuna
Wa Laqad Đarabna Lilnnasi Fi Hadha Al-Qur'ani Min Kulli Mathalin Wa La'in Ji'tahum Bi'ayatin Layaqulanna Al-Ladhina Kafaru 'In 'Antum 'Illa Mubtiluna
Kadhalika Yatba`u Allahu `Ala Qulubi Al-Ladhina La Ya`lamuna
Fasbir 'Inna Wa`da Allahi Haqqun Wa La Yastakhiffannaka Al-Ladhina La Yuqinuna
